name: Three-Toed Sloth
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="slothFurGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,180,150);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,130,100);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <radialGradient id="slothFaceGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,220);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,170);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="100" ry="120" fill="url(#slothFurGrad)" stroke="#666666" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="300" r="50" fill="url(#slothFaceGrad)" />
  <circle cx="230" cy="280" r="8" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="282" cy="280" r="8" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 256 200 L 256 100" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Wombat
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="wombatFurGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,110,80);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(110,60,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="350" rx="150" ry="100" fill="url(#wombatFurGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="320" r="40" fill="url(#wombatFurGrad)" />
  <circle cx="150" cy="320" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 200 450 L 200 400 M 312 450 L 312 400" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="20" stroke-linecap="round" />
</svg>

name: Translucent Jellyfish
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="jellyBellGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="50%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(150,200,255,0.7);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(50,100,200,0.5);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
    <linearGradient id="tentacleGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgba(255,100,200,0.6);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgba(200,50,150,0.3);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 150 250 C 150 150, 362 150, 362 250 Z" fill="url(#jellyBellGrad)" stroke="#4A86E8" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 256 250 Q 200 350, 150 450" stroke="url(#tentacleGrad)" stroke-width="8" fill="none" />
  <path d="M 256 250 Q 312 350, 362 450" stroke="url(#tentacleGrad)" stroke-width="8" fill="none" />
</svg>

name: Electric Eel
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="eelGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,255,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,200,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 256 C 200 150, 350 150, 412 256 C 350 350, 200 350, 100 256 Z" fill="url(#eelGrad)" stroke="#9C9C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 412 256 Q 450 200, 480 256 Q 450 312, 412 256 Z" fill="url(#eelGrad)" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="256" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Pufferfish
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="pufferGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,180,100);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,130,50);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <circle cx="256" cy="256" r="150" fill="url(#pufferGrad)" stroke="#9C7C2C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="200" cy="230" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="312" cy="230" r="10" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 256 106 L 270 126" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 150 256 L 170 270" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
  <path d="M 362 256 L 342 270" stroke="#8B4513" stroke-width="3" />
</svg>

name: Armadillo
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="shellGrad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,110,80);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(110,60,30);stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <ellipse cx="256" cy="300" rx="180" ry="100" fill="url(#shellGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 150 250 L 362 250" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="10, 10" />
  <path d="M 150 300 L 362 300" stroke="#333333" stroke-width="5" stroke-dasharray="10, 10" />
  <rect x="80" y="280" width="20" height="50" fill="url(#shellGrad)" />
</svg>

name: Axolotl
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="axolotlGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(255,200,220);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(200,150,170);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 256 C 150 150, 400 150, 412 256 C 350 350, 200 350, 100 256 Z" fill="url(#axolotlGrad)" stroke="#9C5C7C" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="256" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <path d="M 150 200 L 100 150 M 150 200 L 100 250" stroke="#FF69B4" stroke-width="5" />
</svg>

name: Manatee
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="manateeGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(160,180,200);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(110,130,150);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 300 C 150 200, 400 200, 450 300 C 400 350, 150 350, 100 300 Z" fill="url(#manateeGrad)" stroke="#5C7C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 450 300 L 480 320 L 480 280 Z" fill="url(#manateeGrad)" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="280" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Sea Otter
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="otterGrad" cx="40%" cy="40%" r="80%" fx="40%" fy="40%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(139,69,19);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(101,48,15);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 256 400 C 200 300, 312 300, 256 400 Z" fill="url(#otterGrad)" stroke="#6B2D18" stroke-width="5" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="250" r="80" fill="url(#otterGrad)" />
  <circle cx="256" cy="250" r="30" fill="#FFFFFF" />
  <circle cx="246" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
  <circle cx="266" cy="240" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>

name: Narwhal
svg_content:
<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <radialGradient id="narwhalGrad" cx="50%" cy="50%" r="70%" fx="50%" fy="50%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:rgb(180,200,220);stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:rgb(130,150,170);stop-opacity:1" />
    </radialGradient>
  </defs>
  <path d="M 100 256 C 200 150, 400 150, 450 256 C 400 350, 200 350, 100 256 Z" fill="url(#narwhalGrad)" stroke="#5C7C9C" stroke-width="5" />
  <path d="M 450 256 L 500 256" stroke="#FFFFFF" stroke-width="10" stroke-linecap="round" />
  <circle cx="120" cy="256" r="5" fill="#000000" />
</svg>
